instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1990: What is A1990? A1990 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2018, 2019 with EMC3215, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01041, 820-01814..

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina 15" 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Display Replacement
threads.message: Can the display on this units be replaced without problems with the T2 chip? Meaning the replacement screen will work or only ASP can replace them?

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina 15" 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Display Replacement
threads.message: I know people who changed LCD assembly on T2 machines, without any problem.

threads.title: MacBook Pro Retina 15" 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Display Replacement
